thread.title: Self-Portraits, a Shaman and Cotton Fields
thread.title_full: Self-Portraits, a Shaman and Cotton Fields - WSJ

author: William Meyers
title: Self-Portraits, a Shaman and Cotton Fields
text: Me: Photographic Self-Portraits Ricco Maresca 529 W. 20th St., third Floor 212-627-4819 Through Oct. 31 Man Ray trained Berenice Abbott as his darkroom assistant. That meant she not only learned conventional darkroom techniques, but also the idiosyncratic procedures he used to produce his surreal pictures. Some time between 1945 and 1950, Abbott made a print from the negative of a self-portrait she had taken about 1930. The distorted image has enlarged and elongated eyes set at an acute angle to each other. It is weird,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
